article.title: Curtiss-Wright to Provide Modules for TARDEC
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Curtiss-Wright Controls Incorporated has received a contract from the U.S. Army Tank Automotive Research, Development and Engineering Center (TARDEC) to supply advanced rugged computer processing modules for use in an advanced, large Unmanned Ground Vehicle demonstrator being developed for the Robotic Vehicle Control Architecture for a Future Force Army Technology Objective.
